Plot: On the eve of his enshrinement in the Pro Football Hall of Fame, NFL legends Brett Favre, Tony Dungy, Jon Gruden, Derrick Brooks and John Lynch join Warren Sapp, his mom and others to honor...
Title: The Road to Canton: Warren Sapp - Relentless
Actors: Derrick Brooks, Tony Dungy, Brett Favre, Chip Gierke
